message: Let's start fair. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  This ensures a good starting point for both of us.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering our different inflation rates. Let's see if we can agree on this.
Let's split it evenly this time. We both lose value with each round, and a 50/50 split is the fairest way to ensure we both get something.
